As a Team Assemblers with Bachelor's Degree, your work involves work as part of a team having responsibility for assembling an entire product or component of a product. team assemblers can perform all tasks conducted by the team in the assembly process and rotate through all or most of them, rather than being assigned to a specific task on a permanent basis. may participate in making management decisions affecting the work. includes team leaders who work as part of the team.

occupation.title: Team Assemblers
occupation.description: Work as part of a team having responsibility for assembling an entire product or component of a product. Team assemblers can perform all tasks conducted by the team in the assembly process and rotate through all or most of them, rather than being assigned to a specific task on a permanent basis. May participate in making management decisions affecting the work. Includes team leaders who work as part of the team.
